root.name: Battle Ping Pong
root.description: Overview Battle Ping Pong is a ping pong game developed by Quest Corporation and released only in Japan in 1990. Battle Ping Pong supports one player or two players. There are three options of play, Vs. Comp, Tournament, or Continue. Teams There are eight playable teams in Battle Ping Pong. Each team is a different country. PolandRussiaKoreaUnited StatesCanadaSwedenJapanChina Team Select Screen
